post:
Hello, 
We've been around for 5+ years and own & colocate our hardware and networking gear and have our own ARIN issued IPs for our US based locations. We've recently added new SSD  hardware to our Frankfurt, Germany location and would like to share an offer with you.

**Our Site:** https://crowncloud.net/

**Datacenter** 
AcceleratedIT, Frankfurt, Germany
Test IPv4: 185.194.238.1

Quadranet / Psychz, Los Angeles, USA
Test Quadranet IPv4: 204.152.203.65 
Test Psychz IPv4: 104.149.18.203

You can mention the datacenter name in the order notes if you want your VPS setup at a specific datacenter for Los Angeles, USA.

**Plan 1**
4 GB RAM
60 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$7/month or $35/semi-annual

**Frankfurt, Germany** - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=383
**Los Angeles, USA** - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=376


**Plan 2**
2 GB RAM
30 GB SSD
4 core fair-share access include
1 Snapshot (User can restore/create/destroy snapshot from the panel)
KVM based
2 TB bandwidth per month
1 Gbit/sec upink
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

$5/month or $25/semi-annual

**Frankfurt, Germany** - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=347
**Los Angeles, USA** - https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=285


**Operating systems**
1. We've got 1-click install templates for CentOS 6/7, Debian 8/9/10, various Ubuntu(s) upto 19.04, Windows 2012/2016.
2. SSH Key insert during install support is included
3. In-control panel rDNS support is included
4. Custom ISOs can be requested to be mounted onto your VPS for free as well via ticket.
5. Also do note, We do not provide licenses for Windows, the customer is responsible for the license on the machine.
